conversation.message: Hello, this is Linda the Hepatology Clinic admin desk. Can I help you today?
Hi, yes. I want to do a clinic visit.
Of course. Have you already booked an appointment with us?
Yes, I already booked it.
Great. Could you please upload the NHS App screenshot of your booked appointment for verification?
Thank you, I've received the screenshot. Before we proceed, I need to confirm some basic information. Can you please provide your full name as registered in the NHS?
Marcus Elias Thorne.
Thank you. And your date of birth?
14 August 1978.
Got it. Can you also confirm your current home address?
402 Industrial Pkwy, Apt 4B, Detroit, MI.
Thank you. Could you please confirm your emergency contact or next of kin?
My sister, Janice Thorne. 313-555-0199.
Perfect, thank you. Now I will ask a few medical questions for your pre-consultation. What symptoms made you book the hepatology appointment?
My wife noticed my eyes were yellow and I've been itching a lot.
Understood. When did these symptoms begin?
About two weeks ago.
Have you experienced other symptoms such as abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting, dark urine, pale stools, or fever?
Yeah, nausea and dark urine. No fever.
Noted. Do you have any known liver conditions or any recent medical issues?
I had a dental abscess recently.
Were you prescribed any antibiotics or medications for it?
Yes, Augmentin for 10 days.
Thank you. Are you taking any other medications regularly, including Tylenol or painkillers?
Iâ€™ve taken Tylenol PM and Extra Strength Tylenol quite a lot.
Thank you for the information. Do you consume alcohol, and if so, how often?
Just 1 or 2 drinks on weekends.
Thank you. Do you have any recent lab results from the urgent care visit or any previous provider?
Yes, I have some.
Great. Could you please upload the lab result documents here?
Received, thank you. Do you also have any recent imaging reports? For example, ultrasound, CT, or MRI?
Yes, I also have an ultrasound report.
Please upload the imaging document as well.

Thank you, the documents have been received and added to your file. That concludes the pre-consultation interview. Your appointment on 10 December 2025 is confirmed. If your symptoms worsen, please seek urgent care. Have a good day!
Thank you very much.
